short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Arc Peek" allows users to preview URLs, similar to the functionality in the Arc browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- 𝗗𝗿𝗮𝗴 𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗸𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘄 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘄

Introducing "Arc Peek," a Chrome extension that lets you preview URLs effortlessly, offering a quick glance at web content without needing to fully open the link. Similar to the functionality found in the Arc browser, Arc Peek enhances your browsing experience by allowing you to hover over links and instantly view a preview. Save time and stay focused by getting a sneak peek of web pages before deciding to dive in. Perfect for efficient web surfing and multitasking.
